landing.heroTitle: Peer-to-peer payments built for modern life
landing.heroSubtitle: Say goodbye to complex transfers. With BluePay, send and receive money from friends and family with just a few taps. Your security and privacy are our top priority.
landing.featuresTitle: A smarter, simpler way to pay
landing.featuresSubtitle: Discover how BluePay makes your financial life easier.

features.title: Instant Transactions
features.description: Send and receive money in a flash. No waiting. Experience payments as they should be.

details.title: Lightning-Fast Instant Transactions
details.description: Forget the long waits of bank transfers. BluePay's technology allows your funds to travel from your account to your friend's in seconds. Transactions are completed instantly, day or night, weekends or holidays.
details.application: After dinner with friends, use BluePay to split the bill instantly. No need for anyone to find change or transfer money the next day.

features.title: Easy Social Payments
features.description: Find friends and transfer money easily with a username. No more exchanging sensitive, lengthy bank details.

details.title: Payments Built for Social
details.description: All you need is your friend's BluePay username to pay them or receive money securely. This not only protects both parties' bank account privacy but also makes the payment process as simple and natural as sending a message.
details.application: When ordering afternoon tea for the office, colleagues can easily pay you using just your BluePay username, without adding each other as bank contacts one by one.

features.title: Bank-Grade Security
features.description: Your transaction data is end-to-end encrypted. We never share or sell your data.

details.title: A Rock-Solid Security Commitment
details.description: We use industry-leading end-to-end encryption to ensure your every transaction data is tightly protected during transmission. Furthermore, your personal and financial information will never be used for advertising or sold to third parties. Your security is our highest principle.
details.application: When buying second-hand items online, use BluePay for the transaction. You don't need to disclose your bank card number or sensitive personal information to strangers, significantly reducing the risk of fraud.

privacy.title: Your Privacy, Our Commitment
privacy.description: At BluePay, we believe your financial information should be private. We've designed our platform with privacy in mind from the start.
points: Your transaction data is never used for advertising or sold to third parties.
We use state-of-the-art encryption to protect your every transfer.
You have full control over your data and can view or download it at any time.

bottomCta.title: Ready to experience a simpler way to pay?
bottomCta.subtitle: Join millions of users today and enjoy seamless, secure transactions.
